title: A previous team member of mine from a now disbanded team is giving out my personal details pls help.
body:
Riot Please.

[REMOVED] is his summoner name.
[REMOVED]

In this match of mine, he was in this game and did these things please help.

this is actually a serious issue.

replies.body:
I have removed the duplicate post and the name and shame and have passed this on but the best thing you can do about this is to [submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with any relevant evidence you have.

I'm sorry we can't help you much here on the boards, Player Support are much better equipped to help you with things like this as there are all sorts of privacy issues involved.

If you have any questions I'll help as best I can.
